[A Fighting Chance].abilityText:
If you are Daniel Taylor, you must add this card to any skirmish army you play.

At the start of the game, each figure in your army becomes Stunned.

[A New Hope].abilityText:
Include this card in your army only if each group in your army has one of the following names or sub-names:
- "Hero of the Rebellion"
- "C-3PO'
- "Chewbacca"
- "Han Solo"
- "Leia Organa"
- "Obi-Wan Kenobi"
- "R2-D2"

--------------------------
Deplete this card to have a friendly figure play a Command card with a restriction matching the name of another Deployment card in your army.

[Advanced Com Systems].abilityText:
LEADER ONLY

Abilities on your Deployment card that choose or affect adjacent friendly figures or friendly figures within 2 spaces can choose or affect other friendly figures within 3 spaces instead.

[Balance of the Force].abilityText: You may include an additional 3 points worth of Command cards in your deck.

[Beast Tamer].abilityText:
Exhaust this card at the start of a CREATURE's activation for that figure to perform a move.

Exhaust this card at the start of a figure's activation if that figure has the "NON-SENTIENT" trait. During this activation, that figure can interact.

[Black Market].abilityText:
At the end of each round, a friendly SMUGGLER may suffer 1 Strain. If it does, reveal the top Command card of your deck. Then, you may choose one of the following: 
- Spend VPs equal to the card's cost to draw it
- Discard that card and gain VPs equal to it's cost
- Return that card to the top of your deck

[Channel the Force].abilityText: Exhaust this card when you would draw 1 or more Command cards. Draw 1 fewer card than you would have. Then, search your Command deck for a card with the FORCE USER trait, reveal it, and put it in your hand. Then, shuffle your Command deck. Then, choose a friendly FORCE USER. That figure suffers Strain equal to the cost of the revealed card.

[Clan of Two].abilityText:
At the start of the mission, place The Child companion in your space or an adjacent space. The Child activates at the start or end of your activation. At the end of your activation, push the Child figure or its incapacitated token to your space or an adjacent space. While incapacitated, The Child is not counted for the purposes of control.

The Child cannot suffer Damage unless it is being attacked.

While you are defeated, a UNIQUE figure may retrieve The Child or its incapacitated token to gain 1 VP.

[Combat Suit].abilityText: While you are defending, reduce the Piece value of the attack results by 1, to a minimum of 0.

[Cross Training].abilityText: This group gains the SPY trait. When an attack targeting you is declared, you may replace 1 die in your defense pool with a white die.

[Devious Scheme].abilityText:
After setup, choose your Deployment zone. Your opponent starts the game with initiative and must deploy their figures first.

If your opponent also has "Devious Scheme", this card has no effect.

[Doubt].abilityText:
At the end of the round, you may choose a hostile figure and discard 1 condition or Power Token from that figure.

Deplete this card while a hostile figure is attacking to choose 1 attack die. Your opponent must reroll that die.

[Driven by Hatred].abilityText:
DARTH VADER (LORD OF THE SITH) ONLY

Passive bonus: +1 Hit

You lose "Brutality." While attacking, you may reroll 1 attack die.

At the end of each round, move up to 2 spaces. Then you may use "Force Choke" or perform an attack. When you declare this attack, remove 1 die from your attack pool.

[Explosive Armaments].abilityText:
HUNTER OR DROID ONLY

Each figure in this group gains:

Surge: +1 Damage, Blast 1

Exhaust this card while attacking to apply Blast 1 to the attack results.

[Extra Armor].abilityText: After deployment, distribute 4 Block Tokens among friendly figures.

[Feeding Frenzy].abilityText:
CREATURE ONLY

Exhaust this card while attacking a figure that has suffered damage to apply +1 Hit to the attack results.

While attacking an adjacent figure, you gain: 
- Surge: Recover 2 Damage

[First Strike].abilityText: After setup, you and your opponent both receive 4 VPs

[Flame Trooper].abilityText:
NON-UNIQUE IMPERIAL TROOPER GROUP WITH 2 FIGURES ONLY

Incinerate: After resolving an attack, each figure that suffered damage since this attack was declared suffers 1 Strain. Then, if the attack did not miss, place a Rubble token in the target space.

Fireproof: You cannot suffer Strain. you are unaffected by your own Blast and abilities "Flamethrower" in their name.

[Focused on the Kill].abilityText:
IG-88 (ASSASSIN DROID) ONLY

Passive bonus: +5 Health

At the start of your activation, gain 2 movement points. Before you declare an attack, you become Focused. 

You lose "Surge: Recover 3 Damage." 

You gain: "Surge: Pierce 1."

[Fury of Kashyyyk].abilityText:
WOOKIE ONLY

After an attack targeting a figure in this group is resolved, if that figure suffered 3 or more Damage, it becomes Focused.

[Headhunter].abilityText: Exhaust this card when a hostile figure suffers Strain during your activation. Reduce the amount of Strain suffered by 1. Then, the player controlling that figure must discard 1 random Command card from his hand. If he cannot, that figure suffers 1 Damage.

[Heavy Fire].abilityText:
Exhaust this card after a friendly VEHICLE or HEAVY WEAPON resolves an attack.

For each die in that figure's printed attack pool, you may choose 1 hostile figure within 2 spaces of the target space. Each chosen figure suffers 1 Damage.

Then, for each chosen figure, the figure that attacked gains 1 HARMFUL condition of your opponent's choice.

[Heir to the Jedi].abilityText:
LUKE SKYWALKER ONLY

While attacking, you may reroll 1 attack die.

When you declare a Ranged attack, apply +1 Hit to the attack results.

Before you declare an attack using "Saber Strike" you become Focused.

[Heroic Effort].abilityText:
Include this card in your army only if all Deployment cards in your army are unique. 

When one of your unique figures is defeated, you may draw 1 Command card, then place 1 Command card from your hand on the bottom of your deck.

[Imperial Citadel].abilityText:
Whenever a friendly Imperial figure is defeated, for each Power Token on that figure, place a matching Power Token on this card.

At the start of a friendly Imperial figure's activation, it may gain 1 Power Token from this card.

At the start of each round, place 1 Focus or Damage on this card.

[Imperial Retrofitting].abilityText:
"AT-ST", "GENERAL WEISS" or "SC2-M REPULSOR TANK" ONLY

Exhaust this card at the start of a friendly MASSIVE VEHICLE's activation if it has one of the above name to choose one of the following:
- That figure may perform multiple attacks during this activation.
- That figure performs a move.

Deplete this card before a friendly MASSIVE VEHICLE with one of the above names declares an attack. That figure becomes Focused.

[Indentured Jester].abilityText:
UNIQUE FIGURE ONLY

At the start of the mission, place the Salacious B. Crumb companion in your space. Salacious B. Crumb activates at the start or end of your activation. Salacious. B Crumb is not counted for the purposes of control.

[Last Resort].abilityText: Deplete this card when a figure in this group has suffered Damage equal to its Health. Before that figure is defeated, roll 1 red die. Each figure and object on or adjacent to that figure suffers Damage equal to the Hit results.

[Lie in Ambush].abilityText:
NON-MASSIVE, NON-UNIQUE ONLY

Before Deployment, set one of your groups aside, out of play, and attach this to it. This group does not deploy during deployment.

After an opponent activates a group, if you have 3 or more exhausted or defeated groups and it is not the first round, deploy this group to any deployment zone.

[Mortar Trooper].abilityText:
SHORETROOPER ONLY

Double Action Special (Fire Mission): Perform an attack. You may draw line of sight from any figure in this group, but still measure range from this figure. Apply Blast 1 to the attack results.

Haul: While moving, treat blocking and impassable terrain as difficult terrain.

[Motivation].abilityText:
UNIQUE FIGURE ONLY

Exhaust this card during your activation and choose a friendly figure with a lower figure cost than you with a line of sight to you. That figure may discard a HARMFUL condition or recover 1 Damage. Then, that figure gains 1 movement point.

[On a Diplomatic Mission].abilityText:
LEADER ONLY

Exhaust this card at the end of your activation, if you did not perform an attack, to choose one of the following:
- You gain 2 movement points
- Until the end of the round, apply +1 Evade to your defense results
- You gain 1 VP

[Orbital Bombardment].abilityText:
UNIQUE FIGURE WITH FIGURE COST 4 OR MORE ONLY

You gain: 

Special Action: Place Bombardment tokens on this card equal to the current round number. Then, you may perform an attack.

You may deplete this card at the start of your activation to choose a number of spaces equal to the number of Bombardment tokens that were on this card. Each figure on a chose space suffers 2 Damage.

[Overwatch].abilityText:
E-WEB ENGINEER ONLY

Choose an Overwatch token to be associated with this group.

Figures in this group gain:

Special Action: Place this group's Overwatch token in a space within your line of sight.

Exhaust this card when a hostile figure enters a space on or adjacent to this group's Overwatch token to interrupt to perform an attack targeting that figure. Then remove that Overwatch token.

[Prey on the Weak].abilityText:
HUNTER ONLY

While attacking a figure with a figure cost lower than yours, apply Pierce 1 and +1 Accuracy to the attack results.

[Punishing Strike].abilityText: Exhaust this card when one of your figures applies a HARMFUL condition to a figure. Discard that condition and apply a different HARMFUL condition of your choice.

[Rebel High Command].abilityText: At the end of each game round, draw 1 additional Command card.

[Rogue One].abilityText:
Your army must include Baze Malbus, Bodhi Rook, Cassian Andor, Chirrut Imwe, Jyn Erso, and K-2SO, and cannot include other unique figures that cost 3 or less.

While a friendly figure listed above is attacking, it may discard 1 Power Token of any type from another friendly figure to add +1 Surge to the attack results.

At the start of the first game round, draw 3 Command cards, then place 2 Command cards from your hand on top of your deck.

[Rogue Smuggler].abilityText:
HAN SOLO (SCOUNDREL) ONLY

You lose "Distracting"

While attacking, you may reroll 1 attack die. 

You can use "Return Fire" even if you suffered Damage during the attack.

Exhaust this card at the end of the round to interrupt to perform an attack.

[Rule by Fear].abilityText: At the start of the first game round, draw 2 Command Cards, then choose 1 card in your hand to discard.

[Scavenged Walker].abilityText:
AT-ST OR AT-DP ONLY

Include one of the named groups in your army and attach this card to it. Treat this group's affiliation as SCUM

You lose ASSAULT. After deployment, you may perform a move.

At the end of the round, you may interrupt to perform an attack. Apply -1 Hit to the attack results.

[Scavenged Weaponry].abilityText:
DROID OR VEHICLE ONLY

Exhaust this card when you declare an attack to apply +1 Hit to the attack results.

When the last figure in this group is defeated, you may attach this card to a friendly DROID or VEHICLE group. (Your opponent scores VPs for this attachment each time a group it is attached to is defeated.)

[Smuggler's Run].abilityText:
SMUGGLER ONLY

Special Action: Deplete this card while you are in your opponent's deployment zone. You gain 5 VPs.

[Smuggling Compartment].abilityText:
Before your opponent resolves a Command card or ability, you may exhaust this card to set aside any number of Command cards from your hand. Return them to your hand at the start of the next activation or phase.

-----------

Before the start of the Status Phase, you may look at the top and bottom cards of your Command deck. You may move 1 of those cards to the top or bottom of your Command deck.

[Spectre Cell].abilityText:
Include this card in your army only if each group in your army has "Spectre" or "Chopper" as part of its sub-name.

Friendly figures gain the following passives: +1 Hit, +1 Block

Exhaust this card during a friendly figure's activation to choose another friendly figure. The chosen figure gains 2 movement points and may interrupt to perform an attack.

[Suppressive Fire].abilityText:
TROOPER OR HEAVY WEAPON ONLY

Exhaust this card after you resolve a Ranged attack. If the attack did not miss, the target becomes Weakened. Then, you may choose another SMALL friendly figure within 3 spaces. The chosen figure gains 2 movement points.

[Survivalist].abilityText:
HUNTER OR TROOPER ONLY

You ignore additional movement point costs for difficult terrain and hostile figures.

At the end of each round, if you are in an exterior space, you recover 1 Damage.

[Targeting Computer].abilityText:
VEHICLE, DROID, OR HEAVY WEAPON ONLY

While attacking, figures in this group may reroll 1 attack die.

[Technician Training].abilityText:
All figures in all armies with the names listed below gain the TECHNICIAN trait.

C1-10P ("Chopper"), Jarrod Kelvin, Mak Eskha'rey, R2-D2, Chewbacca, Jawa Scavenger, Ugnaught Tinkerer, Doctor Aphra, Zuckuss, E-Web Engineer, General Sorin

[Temporary Alliance].abilityText: You may include up to 2 SCUM Deployment cards in your army.

[The Darksaber].abilityText:
MAUL OR SABINE WREN ONLY

If you are a FORCE USER, you may use IMPERIAL Command cards. 

Exhaust this card while attacking to reroll 1 attack die.

Special Action: Perform a Melee attack with 1 red die. Treat Blast X as Cleave X during this attack. Then you may perform an attack.

[The General's Ranks].abilityText:
NON-UNIQUE ONLY

When you perform a move, if it is not your activation, you gain 2 additional movement points. 

When you perform an attack, if it is not your activation, apply +1 Hit to the attack results.

[Trusted Ally].abilityText:
DROID ONLY

Exhaust this card while another friendly figure within 3 spaces is attacking. It may reroll 1 attack die.

Exhaust this card during your activation. An adjacent friendly figure recovers 1 Damage or discards 1 HARMFUL condition.

[Under Duress].abilityText: When a hostile figure suffers Strain, for each resulting Damage they wish to prevent, the player controlling that figure must discard 2 Command cards from the top of their deck instead of 1.

[Unshakable].abilityText: Exhaust this card at the start of one of your activations and choose 1 of your figures with a figure cost of 9 or greater. That figure discards 1 HARMFUL condition and suffers 1 Strain.

[Vader's Finest].abilityText:
TROOPER ONLY

Figures in this group gain:

Special Action: Perform an attack, then gain 2 movement points.

Double Action Special: Discard 1 HARMFUL condition and become Focused.

[Wookiee Avenger].abilityText:
CHEWBACCA (LOYAL WOOKIE) ONLY

Passive Bonus: +1 Hit

You lose "Protector". While defending, convert all Dodge results to Evade results.

During setup, search your Command deck for "Debts Repaid", reveal it, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck. Then, draw 1 fewer card into your initial hand. 

Once during your activation, you may use "Slam" without spending an action.

[Z-6 Trooper].abilityText:
NON-UNIQUE REBEL TROOPER GROUP WITH 2 FIGURES ONLY

Rotary Cannon: Before you declare an attack, become Focused.

Special Action (Autofire): Perform an attack. The defending figure adds one white die to its defense pool. This attack gains:
- Surge: After this attack resolves, perform an attack targeting a figure within 3 spaces of the target space.

[Zillo Technique].abilityText:
Exhaust this card while a friendly figure is defending to reduce the Pierce value of the attack results by 2, to a minimum of 0.

While a friendly figure is defending, you may discard 1 Command card to apply +1 Block to the defense results. Limit once per attack.

0-0-0.abilityText:
Surge (Shocking Palm): The attack misses and the defender becomes Stunned.

Special Action (Invasive Procedure): An adjacent figure suffers 1 Damage, 1 Strain, and becomes Bleeding. You become Focused.

Unnerving: At the end of your activation, each adjacent hostile figure becomes Weakened.

4-LOM.abilityText:
Programming Override: At the start of each round, choose one TRAIT. You gain that TRAIT until the end of the round.

Surge (Concussive Bolt): After this attack resolves, if you are targeting a SMALL figure and it did not miss, you may push that figure 1 space.

Shared Intuition: While attacking, if another friendly HUNTER within 3 spaces has line of sight to the target space, apply +1 Hit to your attack results.

Agent Blaise.abilityText:
Adapt: The first time your opponent plays a Command card each round, choose 1 SPY or TROOPER. That figure becomes Hidden

Surge (Interrogate): Look at your opponent's hand and choose a Command card. You may discard a card of equal or greater cost from your hand to discard the chosen card.

Agent Kallus.abilityText:
Hunt Dissent: When your opponent plays a Command card, you may distribute 2 Hit Tokens among friendly figures within 1 space. Limit once per round.

Fulcrum: At the start of your activation, you may have each player draw 1 Command card.

Bo-Rifle: Before you declare an attack, you may treat your attack type as Melee. If you do, replace 1 blue die with 1 red die.

Asajj Ventress.abilityText:
Nimble: After an attack targeting you is resolved, gain 2 movement points for each of your Block results.

Consider It My Payment: At the start of your activation, your opponent reveals a Command card from his hand. During this round, if the next Command card played by that player does not have the same name as the revealed card, that player discards a copy of the revealed card, or reveals a hand without any copies of that card.

Ahsoka Tano.abilityText:
Special Action (Force Leap): Place your figure in an empty space within 6 spaces.

Vigor: At the start of your activation, you may gain 2 movement points or 1 Block Token.

Twin Sabers: While attacking, you may reroll all attack die or force the defender to reroll all defense die.

Alliance Ranger (Elite).abilityText:
Guerilla: After you resolve an attack, if the defender was defeated, become Hidden

Elite Sniper: While attacking, if the target space is 5 or more spaces away, you may reroll up to 2 attack dice.

Alliance Ranger (Regular).abilityText:
Guerilla: After you resolve an attack, if the defender was defeated, become Hidden.

Sniper: While attacking, if the target space is 5 or more spaces away, you reroll 1 attack die.

Alliance Smuggler (Elite).abilityText:
Special Action (Improved Smuggler's Instincts): Perform an interact, then move up to 3 spaces.

Slippery: While defending, apply -2 Accuracy to the attack results. After an attack targeting you resolves, gain 2 movement points.

Alliance Smuggler (Regular).abilityText:
Special Action (Smuggler's Instincts): Perform an attack, then move up to 2 spaces.

Slippery: While defending, apply -2 Accuracy to the attack results. After an attack targeting you resolves, gain 2 movement points.

AT-DP.abilityText:
Assault: You can perform multiple attacks during your activation. 

Charge Generators: While attacking, if you have suffered fewer than 9 Damage, apply +1 Hit to the attack results and you may reroll 1 attack die.

AT-RT.abilityText:
Mortar Launcher: At the end of the round, you may move up to 2 spaces. Then, choose a space within 3 spaces that contains a hostile figure and roll 1 red die. Each figure on or adjacent to that space suffers Damage equal to the Hit results.

Vanguard: While attacking a figure within 3 spaces, you may replace one die in your attack pool with 1 red die.

AT-ST.abilityText:
Targeting Computer: While attacking, you may reroll 1 attack die.

Awkward: You cannot attack adjacent figures.

Bantha Rider.abilityText: Special Action (Trample): Choose up to 3 adjacent hostile figures and roll 1 red die. Each of those figures suffers Damage equal to the Hit results.

Baze Malbus.abilityText:
Into the Fray: At the start of your activation, gain 1 Surge Token for each hostile figure with line of sight to you. Then, gain 1 movement point.

Assault: You can perform multiple attacks each activation.

Hold the Line: At the end of your activation, gain 1 Block Token for each hostile figure with line of sight to you.

Bib Fortuna.abilityText:
Dirty Dealing: You cannot be included in the same army as any REBEL Deployment cards.

Special Action (Bartered Information): Choose another friendly SCUM figure within 2 spaces. Then, you may spend 1 VP to choose another such figure. Each chose figure becomes Focused.

Illicit Arms: While a friendly figure is attacking, if your army's affiliation is SCUM, you may discard 1 Command card from your hand to apply +1 Hit to the attack results. Limit once per attack.

Biv Bodhrik.abilityText:
Special Action (Multi-Fire): Perform 2 attacks. Each attack must have a different target. Apply -1 Hit to each attack's results.

Surge (Suppression): After resolving a Ranged attack, if it did not miss due to accuracy, the target suffers Strain equal to the number of targets Block, Evade, and Dodge, results, to a maximum of 2.

Boba Fett.abilityText:
Wrist Cord: Once per round, you may spend 2 movement points to choose a SMALL figure within 3 spaces in your line of sight. Push the choses figure up to 3 spaces into a space adjacent to you.

Wrist Flamethrower: Once per round, you may spend 2 movement points to choose a space within 2 spaces. Each other figure on or adjacent to that spaces suffers 1 Damage and 1 Strain, then becomes Weakened.

EE-3 Carbine: When you declare an attack, you may spend 2 movement points to change one of your attack die to a red die. Limit once per attack.

Bodhi Rook.abilityText:
Smooth Landing: After Deployment, you and each adjacent friendly figure gains 1 movement point.

Air Support: When a friendly figure spends a Power Token while attacking, apply +2 Accuracy to the attack results.

Bossk.abilityText:
Special Action (Indiscriminate Fire): Perform an attack. After this attack resolves, if it did not miss, choose 1 non-red attack die. Each other figure within 2 spaces of the target space other than the defender suffers Damage equal to the Hit results and Strain equal to the Surge results.

Regenerate: At the end of each round, recover 2 Damage and discard all Harmful conditions.

BT-1.abilityText:
Special Action (Missile Salvo): Perform up to 3 Ranged attacks with different targets using 1 blue, 1 red, or 1 yellow die. Limit once per die. Apply +3 accuracy to each of these attacks.

Assassin: Before you declare an attack, become Focused.

C-3P0.abilityText:
Special Action (Inform): Choose an adjacent friendly figure. That figure becomes Focused.

Cower: While defending, while adjacent to a friendly figure, you may reroll 1 defense die.

Distracting: While a friendly figure is defending, and you are adjacent to the targeted space, apply +1 Evade to the defense results.

Non-Combatant: You cannot attack.

C1-10P \"Chopper\".abilityText:
Special Action (Ram): Move up to 2 spaces, then choose an adjacent figure. If that figure is hostile, roll 1 green die. It suffers Damage equal to the Hit results. Then, if that figure is SMALL, push it up to 1 space.

Special Action (System Shock): Use while on or adjacent to a terminal. Choose a figure on or adjacent to any terminal. That figure suffers 2 Damage and 1 Strain.

Cad Bane.abilityText:
Flawless Execution: Before you declare an attack, you become Focused. If you are already Focused, you may gain 1 Power Token and add 1 attack die of any color to your attack pool instead of 1 green die.

I Make the Rules Now: At the start of another figure's activation, a friendly HUNTER within 4 spaces may gain 1 movement point. Limit once per round.

Cal Kestis.abilityText:
Special Action (Wall Run): Move a number of spaces up to your speed. During this movement, you may ignore terrain in spaces that share an edge or corner with a wall.

Force Slow: At the start of the round, choose a hostile figure within 3 spaces. That figure's group cannot be activated during its owner's next opportunity to resolve an activation.

Captain Terro.abilityText:
Special Action (Flamethrower): Choose a space within 2 spaces. Each other figure on or adjacent to that space suffers 1 Damage and 1 Strain, then becomes Weakened.

Mounted: At the start of your activation, gain 3 movement points.

Efficient Travel: You ignore additional movement point costs for difficult terrain and hostile figures.

Professional: While attacking, you may reroll 1 attack die.

Cara Dune.abilityText:
Shock and Awe: When you declare an attack, you may replace 1 Yellow die in your attack pool with 1 Red die. Limit once per round.

Smash: Once during your activation, choose 1 adjacent hostile figure and roll 1 red die. That figure suffers Damage equal to the Hit results. Then, if it is SMALL, you may push it 1 space to a space adjacent to you.

Hunker Down: While defending, if you share a corner or edge with a space containing blocking, impassable, or difficult terrain, apply +1 Evade to your defense results.

Cassian Andor.abilityText:
Strike Team: After deployment, you and an adjacent friendly figure gain 2 movement points. Then, up to 4 friendly figures outside of your deployment zone each gain 1 Hit Token.

It Will be Alright: Once during your activation, you may choose another friendly figure within 2 spaces that can be defeated. That figure is defeated, then perform a move or attack without spending an action.

Chewbacca.abilityText:
Special Action (Slam): Choose 1 adjacent hostile figure and roll 1 red die. That figure suffers Damage equal to the Hit results. Then, if it is SMALL, you may push it 1 space.

Protector: While a friendly figure is defending, and you are adjacent to the targeted space, apply +1 Block to the defense results. Limit 1 "Protector" ability used per attack.

Chirrut Imwe.abilityText:
Devout: You may use Rebel FORCE USER Command cards.

I'm One With the Force: At the start of a hostile figure's activation, you may move up to 2 spaces to a space adjacent to a hostile figure. Limit once per round.

The Force is With Me: When a Ranged attack targeting you is declared, choose an adjacent hostile figure. If you do, apply -1 Hit to the attack results and the chosen figure suffers 1 Damage.

Clawdite Shapeshifter (Elite).abilityText:
Shape: When you are deployed, you may gain 1 Form card of your choice from the supply.

Shift: At the start of each round, you may switch your Form card with 1 other Form card of your choice.

Clawdite Shapeshifter (Regular).abilityText:
Shape: When you are deployed, you may gain 1 Form card of your choice from the supply.

Shift: At the start of each round, you may switch your Form card with 1 other Form card of your choice.

CT-1701.abilityText:
Special Action (Barrage): Perform 2 attacks. The target of the second attack must be within 3 spaces of the first target space and adds 1 white die to the defense pool.

Cover Fire: After you resolve an attack, distribute 1 Block Token to a friendly figure within 3 spaces. Then, if it did not miss, you may discard 1 condition or Power Token from the target.

Dark Trooper Mk III.abilityText:
Advanced Targeting Computer: When you declare an attack, you become Focused. During this attack, you may reroll 1 attack die. If the rerolled die has fewer Hit symbols than before it was rerolled, apply +1 Hit to the attack results.

Durasteel Fist: Once during your activation, you may choose 1 adjacent figure or object and roll 1 green die. It suffers Damage equal to the Hit results. Then, if you rolled a Surge and the target was a SMALL figure, you may push that figure up to 1 space.

Special Action (Lift Off): Move up to 4 spaces. During this movement, you gain Mobile.

Darth Vader.abilityText:
Special Action (Brutality): Perform 2 attacks. Each attack must have a different target.

Special Action (Force Choke): Choose a hostile figure in your line of sight. That figure suffers 2 Damage and 1 Strain.

Foresight: While defending, you may reroll 1 defense die.

Davith Elso.abilityText:
Stealthy: At the start of the mission, become Hidden.

Cut and Run: When you exit a space containing a hostile figure, that figure suffers 1 Damage. Limit once per figure per round.

Surge (Fell Swoop): After this attack resolves, become Hidden, move up to 2 spaces, then perform an attack. Limit once per round.

Death Trooper (Elite).abilityText:
Squad Captain: Once during your activation, an adjacent friendly TROOPER or LEADER may gain 1 Power Token.

Field Tactics: After your activation, you may immediately activate a friendly TROOPER or LEADER group with cost 6 or less. That group loses "Field Tactics" this round.

Death Trooper (Regular).abilityText:
Security Detail: After deployment, a friendly LEADER gains 1 Block Token.

Field Tactics: After your activation, you may immediately activate a friendly TROOPER or LEADER group with cost 6 or less. That group loses "Field Tactics" this round.

Del Meeko.abilityText:
Expertise: After you perform a Special Action, you may perform an additional action. Limit once per activation.

Special Action (Gifted Mechanic): Choose an adjacent friendly DROID or VEHICLE. If you do, you and that figure each recover 1 Damage and gain 1 Hit Token.

Open-Minded: After this attack resolves, gain 1 movement point or Power Token.

Dengar.abilityText: Surge (Spread the Pain): Choose a HARMFUL condition you have not already chosen during this attack. After this attack resolves, if it did not miss, you may have a figure on or adjacent to the target space gain the chosen condition. This ability can be used multiple times per attack.

Dewback Rider.abilityText:
Special Action (Shock Lance): Choose a figure within 2 spaces and roll 1 green die. That figure suffers Damage equal to the Hit results. Then, if you rolled 1 or more Surge results, that figure becomes Weakened.

Mounted: At the start of your activation, you gain 3 movement points.

Diala Passil.abilityText:
Battle Meditation: Before you declare an attack, become Focused.

Defensive Stance: While defending, you may reroll 1 defense die. If you do, convert each Dodge result to 2 Block and 1 Evade.

Force Throw: Once during your activation, you may suffer 1 Strain to choose another small figure within 3 spaces. Push that figure up to 2 spaces.

Director Krennic.abilityText:
Advanced Weapons Research: At the start of your activation, a friendly figure within 2 spaces may gain 1 Hit Token or 1 Surge Token.

Unhinged Director: When a friendly TROOPER or GUARDIAN within 2 spaces spends a Hit Token or Surge Token while declaring an attack, it may suffer 1 Strain to apply +2 of the chosen symbol to the results instead of +1.

Doctor Aphra.abilityText:
Dubious Counterparts: If your army's affiliation is Scum, you may include "0-0-0" and "BT-1" in your army together. After a friendly DROID resolves "Invasive Procedure" or "Missile Salvo", that figure may perform 1 additional action.

Excavation: At the start of each round, you may choose 1 Command card in any discard pile that costs 1 or less, except "Take Initiative". Once during this round, your player may play that card from the discard pile and then return it to the game box.

Dr. Royce Hemlock.abilityText:
Special Action (Neurotoxin): Choose a space within 3 spaces and roll 1 yellow die. All hostile figures on or adjacent to that space become Weakened and suffer Damage equal to the Hit results.

Special Action (Neurostim): Choose an adjacent friendly figure and roll 1 yellow die. If you rolled a Block, that figure gains a Block Token. Then, if you rolled a Surge, that figure gains a Focus.

Drokkatta.abilityText:
Demolish: Once during your activation, you may choose a space within 3 spaces and line of sight. Each figure on or adjacent to that space suffers 1 Damage. Then, place a rubble token in that space and you suffer 1 Strain.

Surge (Shrapnel): Choose one: This attack gains Blast 2, or after this attack resolves, if it did not miss, each figure and object within 2 spaces of the target space suffers 1 Damage.

E-Web Engineer (Elite).abilityText:
Forward Emplacement: After deployment, you gain movement points equal to your speed.

Tripod: During your activation, you cannot voluntarily exit your space if you attack, and you cannot attack if you exit your space.

Assault: You can perform multiple attacks during your activation.

E-Web Engineer (Regular).abilityText:
Tripod: During your activation, you cannot voluntarily exit your space if you attack, and you cannot attack if you exit your space.

Assault: You can perform multiple attacks each activation.

Echo Base Trooper (Elite).abilityText:
Front Line: While attacking, if the target is within 3 spaces of you, you may replace 1 blue die in your attack pool with 1 red die.

Cortosis Weave: While you are defending, you may reduce the Pierce value of the attack results by 2, to a minimum of 0.

Echo Base Trooper (Regular).abilityText:
Front Line: While attacking, if the target is within 3 spaces of you, you may replace 1 blue die in your attack pool with 1 red die.

Efficient Travel: You ignore additional movement point costs for difficult terrain and hostile figures.

Emperor Palpatine.abilityText:
Emperor: Once during your activation, you may choose another figure within 4 spaces. That figure interrupts to perform an attack.

Tempt: At the start of your activation, a figure of your choice suffers 1 Damage and gains 1 Hit Token.

Special Action (Force Lightning): Choose a figure within 4 spaces and line of sight. That figure suffers 3 Damage and becomes Weakened. Each figure adjacent to that figure suffers 1 Damage.

Ewok Warrior (Elite).abilityText:
Ambush: After you are deployed, you become Hidden.

Forest Fighters: While performing a Melee attack, apply +1 Hit to the attack results if you are Hidden.

Special Action (Sling Barrage): Perform a Ranged attack using your printed attack pool. During this attack, you may reroll up to 1 attack die for each other figure in your group with line of sight to the defender.

Ezra Bridger.abilityText:
Brush: At the start of each round, move up to 4 spaces.

Much to Learn: While attacking, if there is another friendly unique figure within 3 spaces, you may reroll 1 attack die. If that figure is a FORCE USER, you may turn that attack die to any side instead.

Fenn Signis.abilityText:
Havoc Shot: After you resolve an attack, if it did not miss, you may suffer 1 Strain to choose up to 2 figures within 2 spaces of the target space in your line of sight. Those figures suffer 1 Damage.

Tactical Movement: At the start of your activation, you may choose a friendly figure within 3 spaces. That figure gains 2 movement points.

Fennec Shand.abilityText:
Bounty: When you are defeated, your opponent gains 2 VPs.

Sharpshooter: When you declare an attack, if the target is 5 or more spaces away, you become Focused.

Fifth Brother.abilityText:
Vigor: At the start of your activation, you may gain 2 movement points or 1 Block Token.

Relentless Pursuit: When you declare an attack, the target suffers 1 Strain.

Special Action (Sith Acolyte): Search your Command deck for a card with the FORCE USER or BRAWLER trait that costs 2 or less, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your Command deck.

Gaarkhan.abilityText:
Brutal Cleave: After you resolve an attack during your activation, you may suffer 1 Strain to perform an attack using 1 red and 1 yellow die targeting a different figure or object. Limit once per activation.

Special Action (Charge): Move a number of spaces up to your Speed. Then, you may perform an attack.

Gamorrean Guard (Elite).abilityText:
Gamorrean Honor Guard: While defending during a Ranged attack, apply +1 Block to the defense results.

Professional: While attacking, you may reroll 1 attack die.

Gar Saxon.abilityText:
Airborne Commander: Friendly Mobile figures within 4 spaces can use your surge abilities.

Personal Combat Shield: Whenever you spend a Block while defending, apply +1 Evade to the defense results.

Special Action (Gar Saxon's Flamethrower): Choose a space within 2 spaces. Each other figure on or adjacent to that space suffers 1 Damage and 1 Strain and discards 1 Power Token.

General Sorin.abilityText:
Special Action (Bombardment): Choose an adjacent friendly figure. That figure may interrupt to perform an attack. The attack gains Blast 1.

Advanced Firepower: Adjacent friendly DROIDS and VEHICLES can use your surge abilities.

General Weiss.abilityText:
General's Orders: At the start of your activation choose up to 2 other friendly figures on the map. Those figures may each interrupt to perform a move.

Epic Arsenal: Your attack pool consists of any combination of 3 attack dice. You cannot roll more than 2 dice of a single color.

Gideon Argus.abilityText:
Special Action (Tactical Maneuver): Choose another friendly figure in your line of sight. That figure gains 2 movement points.

Special Action (On My Mark): Choose another friendly figure in your line of sight. That figure becomes Focused.

Greedo.abilityText:
Slow on the Draw: When you declare an attack, the defender may interrupt to perform an attack targeting you.

Parting Shot: When you have suffered Damage equal to your Health, before you are defeated, you may interrupt to perform an attack. Then, you are defeated.

Han Solo.abilityText:
Return Fire: After an attack targeting you is resolved, if you did not suffer any Damage, you may interrupt to perform an attack targeting that attacker. Limit once per round.

Distracting: While a friendly figure is defending, and you are adjacent to the targeted space, apply +1 Evade to the defense results.

Cunning: While defending, apply +1 Block to the defense results for each Evade result.

Heavy Stormtrooper (Elite).abilityText:
Modular: You may include an attachment card in your army and decrease its cost by 1, to a minimum of 0. During setup, you must attach that card to this group.

Spray Fire: While attacking, you may apply -3 Accuracy and +1 Surge to the attack results.

Heavy Stormtrooper (Regular).abilityText: Composite Plating: While defending, if the attacker is 4 or more spaces away, apply +1 Block to the defense results.

Hera Syndulla.abilityText:
Call the Shots: While another friendly figure within 3 spaces is attacking, you may apply +2 Accuracy, +1 Hit, or +1 Surge to the attack results. Limit once per round.

Smooth Landing: After Deployment, you and each adjacent friendly figure gains 1 movement point.

Hired Gun (Elite).abilityText:
Self-Preservation: When you suffer Damage, you become Focused.

Parting Shot: When you have suffered Damage equal to your Health, before you are defeated, you may interrupt to perform an attack. Then, you are defeated.

Hired Gun (Regular).abilityText:
Parting Shot: When you have suffered Damage equal to your Health, before you are defeated, you may interrupt to perform an attack. Then, you are defeated.

Disposable: While defending, apply -1 Evade to your defense results.

HK Assassin Droid (Elite).abilityText:
Targeting Computer: While attacking, you may reroll 1 attack die.

Versatile Weaponry: While attacking, you may force the defender to reroll 1 defense die.

Merciless: When you declare an attack, if the defender has any HARMFUL conditions, it suffers 1 Damage.

HK-47.abilityText:
Query: When you declare an attack, apply +1 Hit to the attack results unless the defender becomes Bleeding.

Conclusion: While attacking, apply -1 Evade to the defense results.

Mockery: Once during your activation, you may choose a hostile figure in your line of sight. That figure suffers 1 Strain.

Hondo Ohnaka.abilityText:
Negotiate: When you declare an attack, apply +2 Damage to the attack results unless the defender pays you 2 VPs.

What's Yours is Mine: At the end of a round, if you are in an opponent's deployment zone, that opponent loses 2 VPs and you gain 2 VPs. Limit once per mission.

Iden Versio.abilityText:
Droid Kit: Once during your activation, if a friendly "Dio" is in your space, you may gain 1 Power Token.

Pulse Cannon: While attacking, if you spent a Power Token during this attack, apply an additional +4 Accuracy and +1 Hit to the attack results.

ID10 Seeker Droid: At the start of the game, put the "Dio" companion into play in your space. It activates at the start or end of your activation, and is not counted for the purposes of control.

IG-11.abilityText:
Special Action (Rapid Fire): Perform 2 attacks.

Targeting Computer: While attacking, you may reroll 1 attack die.

Self-Destruct Protocol: When you have suffered Damage equal to your Health, before you are defeated, you may move up to 3 spaces and roll 1 red die. Each figure or object adjacent to you suffers Damage equal to the Hit results. Then, you are defeated.

IG-88.abilityText:
Arsenal: Your attack pool consists of any combination of 2 attack dice.

Relentless: When you declare an attack targeting a figure within 3 spaces, that figure suffers 1 Strain.

Assault: You can perform multiple attacks each activation.

Imperial Officer (Elite).abilityText: Special Action (Executive Order): Choose another friendly Imperial figure within 2 spaces. That figure may interrupt to perform a move or attack.

Imperial Officer (Regular).abilityText:
Special Action (Order): Choose another friendly figure within 2 spaces. During a campaign, that figure may interrupt to perform a move. During a skirmish, that figure gains 2 movement points.

Cower: While defending, while adjacent to a friendly figure, you may reroll 1 defense die.

ISB Infiltrator (Elite).abilityText:
In The Shadows: When you are deployed and at the end of your activation, you become Hidden.

Comms Jammer: Your opponent cannot play Command cards during your activation.

Special Action (Coordinated Raid): Another friendly IMPERIAL figure with figure cost of 4 or less within 4 spaces may interrupt to perform an attack. Limit once per group per round.

ISB Infiltrator (Regular).abilityText: Special Action (Coordinated Raid): Another figure in your group may interrupt to perform an attack targeting a hostile figure in your line of sight. Limit once per group per round.

Jabba the Hutt.abilityText:
Special Action (Bully): A figure of your choice within 3 spaces suffers 3 Damage.

Special Action (Incentivize): An elite figure of your choice becomes Focused.

Special Action (Scheme): Draw 1 Command card.

Double Action Special (Order Hit): Spend 2 VPs. An elite figure of your choice may interrupt to perform an attack. Then, it gains 2 movement points.

Nefarious Gains: When a hostile figure is defeated, gain 1 VP.

Jarrod Kelvin.abilityText:
Special Action (Leaping Slash): Move up to 2 spaces, then perform an attack.

Droid Master: At the start of a mission, put J4X-7 into play in an adjacent space. J4X-7 activates at the start or end of your activation. J4X-7 is not counted for the purposes of control.

Jawa Scavenger (Elite).abilityText:
Surge (Bargain): Spend 1 VP to roll 1 green die. For each Hit result, gain 1 VP.

Take Cover: While defending, you may apply +1 Block and -1 Evade to the defense results.

Scavenged Stock: If your army's affiliation is Scum, you may include up to 3 DROID groups from any other affiliations in your army.

Jawa Scavenger (Regular).abilityText:
Surge (Harass): After the attack resolves, if it did not miss, the defender suffers 1 Strain.

Take Cover: While defending, you may apply +1 Block and -1 Evade to the defense results.

Jet Trooper (Elite).abilityText:
Agile: While defending, you may convert 1 Block to 1 Evade

Fly-By: When you declare an attack, if the target space is within 2 spaces, add 1 blue die to your attack pool. After the attack resolves, gain 2 movement points.

Jet Trooper (Regular).abilityText:
Agile: While defending, you may convert 1 Block to 1 Evade.

Jets: After you resolve an attack, if the target space is within 2 spaces, gain 1 movement point.

Jyn Erso.abilityText:
Trust Goes Both Ways: At the start or end of your activation, choose an adjacent friendly figure. If you do, you and that figure Recover 1 Damage and gain 1 Surge Token. Limit once per round.

Special Action (Tonfa Strike): Move up to 2 spaces, then you may perform a Melee attack using 1 red and 1 green die. Then you may perform an attack.

Jyn Odan.abilityText:
Hair Trigger: At the start of a hostile figure's activation, you may interrupt to perform an attack that targets that figure. Limit once per round.

Sidewinder: After you resolve an attack, you may suffer 1 Strain to move up to 2 spaces. Limit once per round.

Cunning: While defending, apply +1 Block to the defense results for each Evade result.

K-2S0.abilityText:
Vague and Unconvincing: While defending, your player and your opponent cannot spend power tokens or play Command cards.

Cassian Said I Had To: Once per round, when a friendly LEADER enters an adjacent space, gain up to 1 Hit Token.

Special Action (Continually Unexpected): If you have any combination of 2 Hit Tokens or 2 Surge Tokens, perform a Ranged attack using your attack pool.

Kanan Jarrus.abilityText:
Force Vision: At the start of you activation, your opponent chooses one of their ready groups and must activate it next if possible.

Soresu Form: While a friendly figure within 3 spaces is defending, it may reroll 1 die. If it does, convert each Dodge result to 2 Block and 1 Evade and, if that figure is not FORCE USER, you suffer 1 Strain.

Kayn Somos.abilityText:
Special Action (Firing Squad): Choose up to 2 adjacent friendly TROOPERS. Each of those figures may interrupt to perform an attack targeting the same figure.

Surge (Squad Command): Choose an adjacent friendly TROOPER. That figure becomes Focused.

Ko-Tun Feralo.abilityText:
Arms Distribution: At the beginning of your activation, distribute 2 Power Tokens among up to 2 friendly figures within 3 spaces.

Dead Precise: When a friendly figure within 3 spaces spends a Power Token while attacking, apply Pierce 1 and -1 Evade to the attack results.

Squad Cohesion: When a friendly REBEL figure within 3 spaces declares an attack, it may spend a tower token from a friendly REBEL figure within 3 spaces of itself for its effect.

Krrsantan.abilityText:
Full of Rage: Before you declare an attack, if you have suffered 3 or more Damage, become Focused.

Electrified Knuckledusters: Choose an adjacent hostile figure and roll 1 blue die. That figure suffers Damage equal to the Hit results. Then, if you rolled 1 or more Surge results, that figure becomes Stunned.

Kuiil.abilityText:
Mounted: At the start of your activation, gain 3 movement points.

Special Action (Hop On!): Choose a SMALL friendly figure with a figure cost of 8 or less. When you enter that figure's space during this activation, you may interrupt to push that figure 1 space.

Lando Calrissian.abilityText:
Resourceful: While attacking or defending, you may reroll 1 of your attack or defense dice.

Gambit: Before you reroll a die, you may replace it with another die of the same type. After rolling, the new die is considered rerolled.

Shrewd Scoundrel: While attacking or defending, before you reroll a die with "Resourceful", you may guess aloud a number from 0-2. After rerolls, if the number of Hits or Block symbols on that die matches the number you guessed, double that die's results. Limit once per activation.

Leia Organa.abilityText:
Special Action (Battlefield Leadership): Perform an attack, then choose another friendly figure within 3 spaces. That figure may interrupt to move up to 1 space and then perform an attack with the same target.

Military Efficiency: After you resolve an attack, you may choose 1 Command card in your discard pile and shuffle it into your Command deck.

Loku Kanoloa.abilityText:
Set Your Sights: At the start of the mission, place a Recon token on a unique hostile figure. While a friendly figure is attacking a figure with a Recon token, apply Pierce 1 to the attack results.

Priority Target: Figures do not block line of sight for your attacks.

Mon Cala Special Forces: When you declare an attack targeting a figure with a Recon token, you become Focused.

Loth-cat (Elite).abilityText:
Special Action (Pounce): Place your figure in an empty space within 3 spaces. Then, you may perform an attack.

Special Action (Fresh Catch): You or an adjacent CREATURE gains 1 Power Token.

Curious: After you interact, suffer 1 Strain

Loth-cat (Regular).abilityText:

Inspiring: While another friendly figure within 3 spaces is attacking, it may reroll 1 die.

Luke Skywalker (Jedi Knight).abilityText:
Deflect: After a Ranged attack targeting you or an adjacent friendly figure resolves, a hostile figure of your choice in your line of sight suffers 1 Damage.

Heroic: Once during your activation, you may perform an attack without spending an action.

Mak Eshka'rey.abilityText:

Camouflage: Hostile figures 4 or more spaces away cannot draw line of sight to you. You do not block line of sight for those figures.

- IMPERIAL: HUNTER 
- SCUM: SMUGGLER
- REBEL: GUARDIAN

Professional: While attacking, you may reroll 1 attack die.

- This attack gains Reach and Cleave 2
- You become Focused.

Sustained by Rage: You cannot recover Damage. If you have not resolved an activation this round, you cannot be defeated.

Special Action (Improper Procedure): Choose an adjacent hostile figure. That figure suffers 1 Strain and becomes Weakened.

Yoda.abilityText:
Calming Presence: At the start of a friendly Rebel figure's activation, that figure may remove one HARMFUL condition and suffer 1 Strain. Limit once per round.

Wisdom: At the start of your activation, you may draw 1 Command card. If you do, place 1 card from your hand on the bottom of your deck.

Surge (Do or Do Not): Choose another friendly REBEL FORCE USER within 4 spaces. That figure becomes Focused.

Force Deflection: After an attack targeting you or an adjacent friendly Rebel figure resolves, you may have the attacking figure suffer Damage equal to the number of attack dice rolled. Limit once per round.

Zeb Orrelios.abilityText:
Special Action (Bo-Rifle Staff Strike): Once during your activation, you may perform a melee attack using 2 red dice without spending an action.

Lasat Honor Guard: While attacking, after any rerolls, you may turn 1 die showing only a single attack icon to any other side.

[Nemik's Manifesto].abilityText: Your command deck may include up to 3 additional Command cards. Exhaust this card during a friendly figure's activation to have that figure suffer 2 Strain and gain 1 movement point.

Pit Droid.abilityText:
Useful: You can retrieve crates. Adjacent heroes can interact with crates you are carrying.

Shiny: If you are on the map at the end of the mission, heroes gain 50 credits.
